ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the home phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Home_Phone__c ) && NOT(ISNULL(Home_Phone__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Home_Phone__c )) && !REGEX(Home_Phone__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Home_Phone__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Home_Phone__c )) && !REGEX(Home_Phone__c ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for home phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
